articles.description: You’d normally expect a Google app to run flawlessly on a Google phone, but it doesn’t seem to be the case with Google Maps and Pixel smartphones.
articles.content: Several users have noticed that when Google Maps uses the dark mode, it flashes the light theme for less than a second before eventually returning to the dark mode once again.That happens mostly befo… [+1495 chars]
